com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver
Class LQDeviceMessagingReceiver

java.lang.Object
  android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver.LQDeviceMessagingReceiver

public class LQDeviceMessagingReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver

This class is a BroadcastReceiver implementation that handles broadcast messages sent from the push messaging service.

Copyright (c) 2012 Geoloqi Inc. All rights reserved.

Author:
Tristan Waddington

Field Detail

ACTION_C2DM_REGISTER

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_C2DM_REGISTER

Register to receive push notifications.

This action requires the following two extra values:

  • EXTRA_SENDER
  • EXTRA_APP

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_C2DM_UNREGISTER

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_C2DM_UNREGISTER

Unregister from further push notifications.

This action requires the following extra values:

  • EXTRA_APP

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_C2DM_REGISTRATION

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_C2DM_REGISTRATION

Broadcast Action: A push registration result.

The intent will have one of the following extra values:

  • EXTRA_REGISTRATION_ID if the device was registered.
  • EXTRA_UNREGISTERED if the device was unregistered.
  • EXTRA_ERROR if an error occurred.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_C2DM_RECEIVE

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_C2DM_RECEIVE

Broadcast Action: A push message was received.

See Also:

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_REGISTRATION_ID
The push registration ID extra.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

EXTRA_UNREGISTERED

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_UNREGISTERED
If set, this extra indicates that the push messaging service has successfully unregistered this device from receiving additional messages.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

EXTRA_SENDER

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SENDER
The ID of the account authorized to send messages to the application.

Constant Field Values

EXTRA_APP

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_APP
The application's ID, set with a PendingIntent to allow the registration service to extract application information.

DATA_SOUND_ANDROID

public static final java.lang.String DATA_SOUND_ANDROID
An extra containing the notification sound to be played on Android devices. This value should take precedence over any value for DATA_SOUND.
